author: burton
msg: rework of logging.. nothing should ever hit the console.  only turbine.log
install docs updated with warning about remote content refresh
better overall logging so that the developer knows what is going on
removed some old portlets from default

author: burton
msg: - added a content root property where content is now served from.  Not statically linked to
- RSSPortlet now uses content.root from JetSpeedResources
- JetSpeedResources now can be explicitly set via API
- PersistentDocument now logs to the Turbine log

author: burton
msg: updated installation instructiosn to include tubine logfile and the daemons

author: burton
msg: PortletExport now works.  Content is exported to the file you specify
init of a JetspeedServletConfig which meets the ServletConfig interface.
